snippet: All the state’s indie filmmakers aren’t in Austin. A thriving film scene has emerged in Dallas, and this month the inaugural Oak Cliff Film Festival will make it official.
lead_paragraph: All the state’s indie filmmakers aren’t in Austin. A thriving film scene has emerged in Dallas, and this month the inaugural Oak Cliff Film Festival will make it official.

headline.seo: Dallas Has Its Own Indie Film Scene, and Now a Festival
headline.main: Dallas Has Its Own Indie Film Scene, and a Festival
headline.print_headline: Dallas Has Its Own Indie Film Scene, and a Festival
